introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Hello, Thank you for assessing your Google My Business (GMB) profile. Below are the results of our 10-point evaluation.

gmbReportAtGlance.title: Your GMB Report at a Glance

description.title: Missing Description or Description Less Than 300 Characters
description.why: A detailed description helps customers quickly understand what your business offers and builds trust. Short or missing descriptions can make your profile less appealing.
description.recommendation: Write a comprehensive description of at least 300 characters that highlights your unique offerings, key services, and values.

website.title: Missing Website
website.why: A website link allows customers to explore your business in greater detail. Without it, potential customers might turn to competitors for more information.
website.recommendation: Add a working website link to your GMB profile to boost credibility and drive traffic to your site.

review.title: Review Count
review.why: Reviews are social proof. Listings with fewer than 10 reviews appear less credible.
review.recommendation: Encourage your satisfied customers to leave reviews. You can send them a direct link to your GMB profile.

rating.title: Rating Below Average
rating.why: A higher rating indicates better customer satisfaction and improves visibility.
rating.recommendation: Respond to negative reviews politely and focus on customer service improvements.

addCategory.title: Additional Categories Not Present or Less Than 5
addCategory.why: Additional categories help Google understand your services and display your listing for relevant searches.
addCategory.recommendation: Add categories that reflect all your services, like 'Emergency Plumbing' or 'Installation'.

photo.title: Less Than 5 Photos
photo.why: High-quality photos enhance your profile and attract more customers.
photo.recommendation: Upload updated and clear photos regularly.

workingHrs.title: Missing Working Hours
workingHrs.why: Customers need to know when you're open. Missing hours can result in lost opportunities.
workingHrs.recommendation: Add complete business hours, including holidays or special days.

attributes.title: Missing or Incomplete Attributes
attributes.why: Attributes like 'Free Wi-Fi' or 'Wheelchair Accessible' can influence a customer's decision.
attributes.recommendation: Update your attributes based on customer expectations and your offerings.

profile.title: Logo Not Present or Unclear
profile.why: A professional logo builds brand trust and makes your profile look credible.
profile.recommendation: Add a high-resolution logo that's consistent across platforms.

competitor.title: Competitor Comparison
competitor.why: You need to match or outperform your competitors to stay relevant.
competitor.recommendation: Analyze what competitors are doing better and improve your listing.

citation.title: Low Citation Count
citation.why: Citations boost local SEO and establish business legitimacy.
citation.recommendation: Submit your business to local directories like Yelp and Yellow Pages.

competitorAnalysis.title: Competitor Analysis
competitorAnalysis.subtitle: See how you compare against your local competitors
competitorAnalysis.description: The listing outperforms or matches its competitors in key areas.
competitorAnalysis.whyItMatters: Standing out among competitors increases the chance of attracting more customers.
competitorAnalysis.recommendation: Analyze competitor profile and focus on areas where they excel such as better rating or more detailed description.

citationAnalysis.title: Citation Analysis
citationAnalysis.description: The Listing Has Fewer Citation Than Competitors.
citationAnalysis.whyItMatters: Citations improve local SEO ranking and signal credibility to search engines and customers.
citationAnalysis.recommendation: Identify citation gaps by auditing competitor profiles. Submit your business to directories like Yelp, Yellow Pages and other niche-specific sites.
citationAnalysis.compare: Compare local citation counts across competitors

summaryOfRecommendations.title: Summary of Recommendations
recommendations: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews.
The logo is present and professional.
